name: Counting Backwards
description:
Created in a small handful of hours, Counting Backwards isn't going to win any awards. The rules are simple:

  • Press Play to start a round
  • Once the round starts, count down from 32 to 1 by clicking on the corresponding buttons
  • Try to beat your best score!

Bonus: Check out the Online Leaderboard to see how you rank against the rest of the world!
